original_title: I Hope My Husband Never Finds Out - Today I'm Being Ravished By My Father-In-Law Again. He Keeps Making Me Cum... Karen Kaede
overview: Karen felt pity for her father-in-law who recently lost the wife, and suggested for him to come live at the house. Not fully understanding the consequences.  As the father-in-law was only interested in drinking and gambling, but with Karen around he finds a new motivation.
title: I Hope My Husband Never Finds Out - Today I'm Being Ravished By My Father-In-Law Again. He Keeps Making Me Cum... Karen Kaede
